name: Trash Panda Express
description:
In an effort to afford better food for him and his raccoon friend's, Shifty the raccoon decides to take over an abandoned Asian fusion restaurant where he serves trash made into what appears to be edible food to humans, and then uses the profits to feed himself and his friends healthy store bought food.

In order to succeed, you must complete the actions for each order before the order's time is up and you end up with a dissatisfied customer. Fail to complete three orders in time, and the game is over.

*Except for animations, the game does not work right now. To see the animations press one of the following keys: Q, W, E, R, H, Y
